description: This file provides wrapper functions for note-related API operations, including listing, creating, updating, and deleting notes, built on top of an API client.

methods.name: export async function listNotes(params?: ListNotesParams): Promise<Note[]> { listNotes
methods.description: Fetches a list of notes, optionally filtered by provided parameters.

methods.name: export async function createNote(title: string, content: string): Promise<Note> { createNote
methods.description: Creates a new note with specified title and content.

methods.name: export async function updateNote(id: string, title: string, content: string): Promise<Note> { updateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by id with new title and content.

methods.name: export async function deleteNote(id: string): Promise<void> { deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note by its id.

ctags.name: createNote
ctags.pattern: /^export async function createNote(title: string, content: string): Promise<Note> {$/

ctags.name: updateNote
ctags.pattern: /^export async function updateNote(id: string, title: string, content: string): Promise<Note> {$/
